documents.document: @DaniC_Shimmer @HerVioletEyes We do! Tea time with @Notes_Nonsense too? :D
@HerVioletEyes "Do we need more ice cream?" Ummm. D:
@Notes_Nonsense Glad to hear, hun! We must tea time again soon. :D
@Notes_Nonsense Oh my goodness! Happy Birthday, hun~! <3
@Crazytheorychic I'm sorry to hear that, hun. :(
@HerVioletEyes I'll get you some tea and hugs, hun. :(
@HerVioletEyes I'll drop by in a sec~ <3
@HerVioletEyes They are even more lovely in person. ^_^
@LadyOfRaindrops @Crazytheorychic Sure! I'll bring Alma along too! :D
@HerVioletEyes And they are total sweeties~ I love them so. ^_^
@HerVioletEyes @IantoJClarke I think the word is voluntold! I read that somewhere. :)
@HerVioletEyes That's true. Alma holds back a lot because I don't run much. >_>
@HerVioletEyes It's super hard to do because the dogs follow us! :D
@HerVioletEyes As long as I'm the one on the other side of the camera. :P
RT @RobertsSpaceInd: Help the Herald! Retweet this message to help decrypt your first look at the next Star Citizen ship design! https://t.…
@HerVioletEyes *hugs* Hope they're good thoughts. Gimme a call if you need anything, kay?
OMG @HerVioletEyes!!!! Thank you so much, hun! This was such a surprise! :D!!!!!! https://t.co/FvcKn9QWiv
@HerVioletEyes @DJ_Trevalin Alma also looked super excited way before I smelled it. :D
@DJ_Trevalin <3! Thank you, hun~! :D Is that BBQ I smell on the way in? :3 (If it is, the ice cream is safe...for now!)
@HerVioletEyes Was I the one telling it? D:
@Bookwyrm87 ((That's right. Purge all xenos filth! Rule the galaxy with an iron tentacle!))
@HerVioletEyes Well, I can't look at that china set the same way ever again.
@scrymeariverpls Your friend takes great photos, hun. :)
Many yummy things were consumed today with @HerVioletEyes . :3 https://t.co/YYi6yeuSom
@scrymeariverpls Not silly at all! I think it's cute. ^_^
@mscatelin @Demifae @DresByDay Mm.. Sure! Then I need to get home though. ^_^
@scrymeariverpls Nothing to be sorry for! And just Vi is fine. :D
@HerVioletEyes Ahhhhh~! And you're a Khaleesi I see.
@scrymeariverpls That's my job! :D Nice to meet you too! You seem nice. ^_^
@scrymeariverpls I am well! Thank you! I don't think so either. I don't twitters much. :)
@HerVioletEyes Yes you can! Love that look. ^_^
@HerVioletEyes Okay! Good, I was worried. ^_^ <3 <3 <3 hun~!
#DescribeYourselfAs3FictionalCharacters I think I got this right. ^_^ https://t.co/5r67idgquv
@HerVioletEyes Much hugs, hun. :( Lemme make you some tea.
@DaniC_Shimmer @Notes_Nonsense Mm! Take care of yourself. We miss you, hun!
@Demifae @HerVioletEyes Lia is having such a hard time deciding. :3
@HerVioletEyes Mm~! Mine has so much jam! ^_^
@DJ_Trevalin @HerVioletEyes Happy Birthday, hun~! :D You're getting gifts anyway, ya know. :P
RT @DJ_Trevalin: It's my b-day party tonight with @HerVioletEyes! No gifts please! Your company is gift enough! :) So glad to finally be of…
@HerVioletEyes We have been eating lots of these. For science. And sample size, or something.
@Crazytheorychic This is a great location! And Alma's definitely taking in the nature. :D https://t.co/2clMYUErrH
